question: السلام عليكم، في مكان اقدر احصل فيه على pdf او سلايدات لمواد السمستر؟

topic: CV Repository for Internships and Jobs
question: Are you looking for internship or permanent work?
answer: This is a voluntary student CV repository for Faculty of Electrical Engineering, Universiti Teknologi Malaysia. Your information will be shared with companies, sponsors of FKE events, for hiring and recruitment purposes only. Kindly help to forward this voluntary CV repository link to your friends, who are looking for internships and permanent positions. Can also share to other faculties. https://forms.gle/qoFcRkzU9SwwCctf6 Please upload your CV/resume and provide your contact information to be shared with companies. If there are any issues with the form, please contact: eileensu@utm.my

question: الدورة حتكون مُسجلة ؟
answer: الدورة كاملة اونلاين من بدايتها الى نهايتها ان شاء الله

question: في واحد معه جدول تقييم ال gpa حسب الدرجات ؟
answer: ممكن تستخدم موقع اسمه utm gpa calculator لو بحثت https://gradecalc.info/my/utm/cumulative_gpa_calc.pl

question: متى نقدر نغير السكشنات
answer: ان شاء الله لما يفتح السمستر باسبوع اول اسبوع للي ماسجلو مواد (special registration) بعده التعديل/الحذف (amendment)
